scripts.typecheck: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared --workspace=packages/database && tsc --noEmit -p packages/shared && tsc --noEmit -p packages/database && tsc --noEmit -p packages/ingestion && tsc --noEmit -p packages/processor && tsc --noEmit -p packages/infrastructure
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present; rimraf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist
